New Records: Wales registered twice as many passes as Turkey
Wales had almost twice as many touches and 70% possession
Wales had 15 shots compared to Turkey's 5
Key Match Events: Baris Yilmaz was sent off for a late tackle on Neco Williams
Sorba Thomas had a goal disallowed for offside
Aaron Ramsey went close with two attempts
Ethan Ampadu rattled a shot against a stanchion
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy expressed confidence in his team's performance
Wales had a nervous but exciting buildup with a resounding performance against a higher-ranked Turkey team
Turkey's manager attributed their performance issues to the physical toll from the Euro 2024 tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy praised the team's effort and learning curve
Vincenzo Montella, the Turkey manager, criticized his team's display and the lack of rest after Euro 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bellamy made a few jokes about his previous life as a player
Turkey had eight added minutes due to substitutions and injuries
Sorba Thomas' return from a long injury layoff was notable
